PassiveDesc.Name: Sinking into Despair
PassiveDesc.Desc: Unable to act Ends Phase 1 if you are at 1 HP. If "Book Hunter's Page" is equipped on a Librarian in the library and your HP is still above 1 after Scene 6...

PassiveDesc.Name: Original Sin
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, all characters gain 1 stack of "Damage Up" and this character gains 1 stack of "Fragile". Each trigger of this passive increases the number of stacks gained by 1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Broken Heart
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, the Assistant Librarian with the fewest Abnormality Pages gains a special Abnormality Page (always gained in the same order) and gains +1 Speed ​​Dice for the duration of this Phase. If Scene 6 occurs, all Assistant Librarians gain the "Gaze" Combat Page.

PassiveDesc.Name: Dying Light
PassiveDesc.Desc: When the HP of any character other than yourself reaches 1 in this Phase, restore their HP to full and reduce your HP by 50.

PassiveDesc.Name: Betrayal
PassiveDesc.Desc: Target the librarian who last attacked you in the previous scene. If no target attacked you, attack "Angela."

PassiveDesc.Name: Frenzy
PassiveDesc.Desc: If no damage is dealt in a scene, take 15% of your HP in damage and gain 1 stack of "Strength" and "Endurance" for the duration of this Phase (this will not be triggered if you are Staggered at the start of the Scene).

PassiveDesc.Name: Corroding Hatred
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of Scene 6, all passive abilities are removed and the Combat Page "Gaze" is played.

PassiveDesc.Name: Understanding
PassiveDesc.Desc: When you Roll Offensive dice against a Staggered target destroys the Offensive Dice.

PassiveDesc.Name: Record Keeper
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, remove one Positive Status Effect from a target with "Fate" that was Staggered in the previous Scene for every 2 stacks of "Fate" they possess.

PassiveDesc.Name: The Eye Embracing the Past - Building the Future
PassiveDesc.Desc: Immune to Negative Status Effects. Stagger Damage dealt by this character is not reduced by the value of the opponent's Offensive dice.

PassiveDesc.Name: Faith
PassiveDesc.Desc: When rolling a "Defense" dice, if there is no clashing dice, play a random "Offense" dice with a maximum and minimum value equal to half of the Defensive dice (rounded up). Dice rolled this way do not cause physical damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pulsation
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of each Scene, if all surviving Assistant Librarians have "Mark," Move to the next Phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: Whispering
PassiveDesc.Desc: When attacked, applies 1 "Mark" to the attacker. At the start of the 5th Scene, all characters will gain 6 'Mark'.
When switching phases, restores all librarians' health and Stagger Resist to full and changes the effect of "Mark."

PassiveDesc.Name: Guidance
PassiveDesc.Desc: If you take fatal damage without a "Mark," you die. If you have a "Mark," you become unable to act for 1 Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Desire
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon death, restore all other Assistant Librarians to full Hp and Stagger Resist, and increase all resistances by 1 level for the current phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: Serpent of Original Sin
PassiveDesc.Desc: Damage and Stagger Damage you would have taken by is shared by all characters with "Mark" instead. Your dice can't be destroyed by effect.

PassiveDesc.Name: False Salvation
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of each Scene, if you have no remaining dice, remove all characters' Whisper and reduce their "Brand" by 1. If the character is a librarian, they also restore 20 points of health and Stagger Resist.

PassiveDesc.Name: Whisper
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever dice are rolled in the Scene, if you are neither the user nor the target of those dice, apply 1 stack of Whisper to all characters except yourself.

PassiveDesc.Name: Silent Slumber
PassiveDesc.Desc: After using a card, if you did not lose clashes with the card, Stagger the target. If the target is already Staggered, kill the target.

PassiveDesc.Name: Erosion of Light/Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, remove the page from your hand and place the page you intend to use in your hand. Page cost is 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: A Moment of Rest
PassiveDesc.Desc: If you take fatal damage while not possessing a "Brand," you lose all "Whispers" and enter a state of suspended animation. Suspended animation ends at the end of the Scene you acquire a "Brand."

PassiveDesc.Name: Follower
PassiveDesc.Desc: When you take fatal damage or become Staggered while possessing a "Brand," you consume 1 stack of "Brand" and restore all your health and Stagger Resist. Each time this effect is triggered, you gain 1 stack of "Strength" and "Endurance" for the rest of the Scene (resets when you are in suspended animation).

PassiveDesc.Name: Actor on the Stage
PassiveDesc.Desc: Restarting the reception will start with the current stage. All passive abilities will change when switching. (Select Cancel Reception on the Prepare Reception screen to reset the reception.)

PassiveDesc.Name: Host of the Stage
PassiveDesc.Desc: When switching phases, at the start of this Scene, restore 2 points of Light to all allied characters and draw 1 page.

PassiveDesc.Name: Red Mist
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each act, set your lowest Speed dice to infinity. When rolling dice, increase the Power of all dice on the current page by +1 for every 2 points your Speed exceeds the target (up to +5).

PassiveDesc.Name: The Courage to Protect Others
PassiveDesc.Desc: On Combat Start, gain 2 Slash Counter dice (4-8). While you have Counter dice, if "Hokma" is the target of a one-sided attack, redirect the attack to you. Your Counter dice are not consumed upon completion of use.

PassiveDesc.Name: Faith
PassiveDesc.Desc: When rolling a "Defense" die, if there is no clashing die, place a random "Offense" die with the maximum and minimum values equal to half of the die (rounded up).

PassiveDesc.Name: Guilt
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain 70 stacks of "E.G.O. Collapse" upon starting the stage. Stagger damage taken from dice is converted to Stagger Resist recovery.

PassiveDesc.Name: Self-destructive Impulse
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of the "Self-destructive Impulse" act, you inflict Stagger damage proportional to your "E.G.O. Collapse" status. If "E.G.O. Collapse" reaches 100 or your character becomes Staggered or dies, the reception fails.
What hope is there in this hell...?

PassiveDesc.Name: The Girl on the Other Side of the Stage
PassiveDesc.Desc: Each Scene, you switch control of your own stage with that of "Gebura" and "Hokma." When you restart the reception, you'll use the current stage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Hope
PassiveDesc.Desc: Winning a clash reduces your maximum HP by 8% and restores Angela's Stagger Resist.

PassiveDesc.Name: Continued Trust
PassiveDesc.Desc: Winning a clash 3/6 times in each Scene causes one Cocoon to use a special page instead of a mass attack page in the next "Gubura" stage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pulsation
PassiveDesc.Desc: Using a Mass Attack Page inflicts 20 Stagger Damage to all Assistant Librarians and causes them to Panic.

PassiveDesc.Name: Whispering
PassiveDesc.Desc: When hit, increases Angela's E.G.O. Collapse by an amount equal to the die value, and causes all characters on stage to take Stagger Damage equal to twice the die value.

PassiveDesc.Name: Self-destructive Impulse
PassiveDesc.Desc: Summons two Assistant Librarians at the start of each scene. When an Assistant Librarian dies, increases Angela's E.G.O. Collapse by 20.

PassiveDesc.Name: Broken Rationality
PassiveDesc.Desc: Stagger damage taken by the designated librarian is converted to Stagger Resist recovery. Die if you become Staggered.

PassiveDesc.Name: Sweeping Madness
PassiveDesc.Desc: Start the stage with a random "Panic" status. If Stagger Resist is fully restored, Angela's "E.G.O. Collapse" stacks are reduced by 5 and the "Panic" progress is reset (limited to once per Scene).

PassiveDesc.Name: Gearwheel
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of each Scene, if your Stagger Resist is above 30%, your own Stagger Resist is reduced to 30%, and Angela's "E.G.O. Collapse" stacks are increased by 2 times your Panic Level.

PassiveDesc.Name: Actor on the Stage
PassiveDesc.Desc: E.G.O. manifests and all of your "Instinct" pages have a cost of 0. Offensive dice deal no damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Actors on the Stage
PassiveDesc.Desc: Whenever the assistant librarian's Panic State is reset by your own attack, your Stagger Resist is restored by 50% and the emotion coins of one of your E.G.O pages is fully restored.

PassiveDesc.Name: Host of the Stage
PassiveDesc.Desc: Restores all allied characters to full Light at the start of each "Gebura" stage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Recorder
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Rolling a defensive dice, gains +2 power. If the dice wins a clash, they are used again (limited to one roll per dice).

PassiveDesc.Name: Prophet
PassiveDesc.Desc: When restarting a reception, the reception will begin with the current stage. If the "Blooming Light" is lost and the reception fails, the progress will be reset.

PassiveDesc.Name: Prologue
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain 4 stacks of "Blooming Light" upon starting the Act. If "Blooming Light" is less than 5, lose control of Speed dice inversely proportional to the number of stacks.

PassiveDesc.Name: Wish for Mutual Growth
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain 1 stack of "Blooming Light" each time you grant "Book Hunter" a positive status.

PassiveDesc.Name: Book Hunter
PassiveDesc.Desc: Add 2 to the maximum and minimum dice rolls for "Knowledge" pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Proof of Hope
PassiveDesc.Desc: If you or "Angela" is Staggered or dies, "Angela" loses all "Blooming Light."

PassiveDesc.Name: Serpent of Original Sin
PassiveDesc.Desc: If there are other surviving allies, this character cannot be selected. This effect changes at the end of the Scene when all other allies die.

PassiveDesc.Name: Postscript
PassiveDesc.Desc: If no clashes are lost in a Scene, apply 2 stacks of "Paralysis" to all librarians and cause Angela to lose 1 stack of "Blooming Light." This effect changes at the end of the Scene when all other allies die.

PassiveDesc.Name: Blooming Paradise
PassiveDesc.Desc: Each time Angela is hit or loses a clash to this character, she loses 1 stack of "Blooming Light" and is inflicted with 1 stack of "Paralysis" for the current and next scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Scale of Sin
PassiveDesc.Desc: When the Act starts, you gain one of four "Ordeal" Abnormality pages and "Blooming Sin."

PassiveDesc.Name: Accept Everything
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon death, your Abnormality pages and "Blooming Sin" will be transferred to "Angela."

PassiveDesc.Name: Legend of the Red Mist
PassiveDesc.Desc: +1 Speed Dice Additional +1 Speed Dice after reaching Emotion Level 3 (unique passive) Gain the E.G.O. Page "Great Split Vertical" upon starting an Act If Emotion Level has reached Level 4 at the start of each Act, place "E.G.O. Manifestation" in your hand (once per act)

PassiveDesc.Name: The Courage to Protect Others
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain 2 Slash Counter Dice (4-8) On Combat start While you have Counter Dice, if another ally is the target of a one-sided attack, redirect that attack to you. Your Counter Dice are not consumed upon use.

PassiveDesc.Name: Red Mist
PassiveDesc.Desc: All dice gain +2 power Can use the E.G.O. page "Great Split Horizontal" Give 1 stack of "Red Mist" when killing an enemy character For each stack of "Red Mist," all dice gain +1 power (up to +5) If there are targetable enemies during the scene and the you have not dealt at least 50 points of damage, at the end of the scene, take 40% of your maximum Stagger Resist as Stagger damage. If you become Staggered, the "E.G.O. Manifestation" status will be removed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Blessing
PassiveDesc.Desc: The number of Abnormality pages you possess increases the minimum value of all dice by +1. If all allied characters possess their own Abnormality pages, the maximum and minimum values of all dice will be increased by +1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Angela
PassiveDesc.Desc: When the stage starts, all allies draw 2 pages.

PassiveDesc.Name: Qliphoth Tree
PassiveDesc.Desc: When this character grants a positive status to another ally, the number of stacks gained increases by 1. If this character grants a positive status to another ally using a combat page, this character gains an additional "Qliphoth" point.

PassiveDesc.Name: Pure Heart
PassiveDesc.Desc: Reduces the cost of all allies' personal E.G.O. pages by 1 and reduces the required Emotion by half.

PassiveDesc.Name: Rising Star
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Emotion Coins are gained by an ally already at full Emotion Coins, they will be distributed to an unfilled ally.

PassiveDesc.Name: Serpent of Original Sin
PassiveDesc.Desc: When using a page, apply "Mark" to the target. (Mark - increases or decreases the power of the designated target.)

PassiveDesc.Name: Whispering
PassiveDesc.Desc: When an uncontrolled ally uses a page, this characters's "Qliphoth" counter is reduced by 1.

PassiveDesc.Name: Slumber
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each scene, this character applies "Pale Hand" to a random enemy character (prioritizing the last target attacked). (Pale Hand: Speed is reduced by 1-3, and damage and Stagger damage received is increased by the speed reduction value.)

PassiveDesc.Name: False Wish
PassiveDesc.Desc: (Only available for patron librarians) When equipped with a Combat Page, you can equip a second deck that controls your passive ability.

PassiveDesc.Name: Secretary
PassiveDesc.Desc: When equipped with a Combat Page, you can equip a second deck that controls your passive ability.

PassiveDesc.Name: Gebura
PassiveDesc.Desc: Only available for the following characters: -Language-level patron librarian -General-level assistant librarian when Ayin is the general-level patron librarian.

PassiveDesc.Name: Assistant Librarian
PassiveDesc.Desc: All passive abilities of this character will not trigger if no other patron librarians are alive.

PassiveDesc.Name: Apostle/ Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each act, remove the page in your hand and place the page you intend to use in your hand. The cost of your own page is 0. When assimilation is removed, restore 30% of your maximum HP and Stagger Resist.
